title: Freewheel: Volume One
description: Jamie and her older brother Jack have always been inseparable. Growing up mostly in foster care, he's the only family Jamie has ever known. So when she wakes up one morning to find him gone without a trace, she takes it upon herself to find him. Little does she know, there is a whole secret society of people just outside our own who are ready and willing to help her on her quest.
author: Liz Baillie
